thread.title: U.S. may soon recognise Israel's hold on Golan

title: U.S. may soon recognise Israel's hold on Golan
text:
U.S. may soon recognise Israel's hold on Golan 8:35pm IST - 01:49
Israel is pressing the Trump administration to recognise its sovereignty over the occupied Golan Heights, an Israeli cabinet minister said on Wednesday, predicting U.S. assent could come within months. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Israel is pressing the Trump administration to recognise its sovereignty over the occupied Golan Heights, an Israeli cabinet minister said on Wednesday, predicting U.S. assent could come within months.
